sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from "react"; import { translationMemoryContext } from "../TranslationMemory"; const GameStats = () => { const translationMemoryStore = useContext(translationMemoryContext); const phrases = translationMemoryStore?.phrases; const startTime: any = translationMemoryStore?.startTime; const endTime: any = new Date(); return ( <>
Game Results Summary
Total number of words/phrases {phrases?.length}
Total Incorrect incorrect counter
Total Time {endTime-startTime}
) } export default GameStats;
